column5: Google Earth maps show the Gouin mostly ice cover (as of today), anyone know if this is current conditions? Thanks for your input.
Google earth is NEVER current conditions.
Thxs. I new Google Satellite wasn't current but I thought Google Earth was...my bad. Here's good info. http://www.gearthblog.com/blog/archi...te_the_im.html
Thxs McQ. Have you fished the Gouin this spring yet? Any reports?
